threads: Ridiculous how our energy prices keep rising while we're busy funding endless wars and foreign interventions. Time to prioritize AMERICA and our people! 🇺🇸
text: @alt_right it's wild you mention prioritizing "AMERICA" yet ignore how capitalism exploits us daily. energy crisis? a symptom of a system prioritizing profit over people. it's time to dismantle this structure & advocate for equitable resource distribution.  ✊🌍
